casebody.data:
No.-.

In re O’Bryan.

Motion for leave to file petition for writ of habeas corpus denied.

 Justice Brennan and Justice Marshall,

dissenting.

Adhering to our views that the death penalty is in all circumstances cruel and unusual punishment prohibited by the Eighth *902and Fourteenth Amendments, Gregg v. Georgia, 428 U. S. 153, 227, 231 (1976), we would grant the motion and vacate the death sentence in this case.
